Information_1_1: ^Hmph. I see you there. Got something to say?
^I just have some questions. I'm new in town, name's Revna.
Information_1_2: ^Well, ask away. I ain't got all day.
^Is there anyone I should investigate in town?
^How do you get along with the people around you?
^Alright, thanks Toke. I will talk to you later.

c-0: ^Well, I hate to start rumors, but Gro really dislikes children.
^I don't know about that... but it is worth mentioning.

c-1: ^Actually, now that you ask, I have seen something.

c-0: ^Yes actually! I saw light coming from deep in the forest in the night!
^Our ancestors told us to keep out of the deep forest. Also to respect it!

c-2: ^You mean Sigrid and Birger? They are kind enough. Sigrid can be tough, but she works hard.

c-0: ^Oh yes! She has never given me a reason not to.
c-1: ^Yes! A talented woodworker too. Got some really good wood from him.
